andromeda.why: Refuses forced hustle; sovereignty to let the body set the pace.

arcturus.why: Early somatic calibration—safety, pacing, and conditions before entry.

draco.why: Proving strength by overriding the body to win status.

lyra.why: Embodied grace—joy of being in the body, not performance.

orion-dark.why: Rank/etiquette used to push ‘right place’ before readiness.

orion-light.why: Discipline of restraint—wait for the true opening.

pleiades.why: Attuned care—nervous-system ease so placement can happen naturally.

sirius.why: Pre-teaching embodiment hygiene; no formal transmission yet.

andromeda.why: Declines coercion into roles/places that the body refuses.

arcturus.why: Places body/resources where they function best—conditions for flow.

draco.why: Gatekeeping: ‘prove you belong here’ despite somatic cues.

lyra.why: Natural elegance—the right place reveals effortless beauty.

orion-dark.why: Protocol-as-control to override true bodily timing.

orion-light.why: Courage to hold position until timing is genuinely right.

pleiades.why: Relational pacing and comfort so the placement bonds can form.

sirius.why: Practical placement, not yet a teaching channel.

andromeda.why: Reclaims choice after misplacement/overreach—body sovereignty reset.

arcturus.why: Regulation wobble—injury/strain while learning correct conditions.

draco.why: Predatory ‘toughen up’ scripts that punish sensitivity.

orion-dark.why: Hierarchy of ‘worthy bodies’ enforcing the wrong place/time.

orion-light.why: Ordeal of correction—admit misread, re-center, recommit cleanly.

pleiades.why: Enmeshment soothing that ignores the body’s ‘no.’

sirius.why: Self-forging of embodied wisdom; no law transmission yet.

andromeda.why: Advocates freedom to follow the body’s route, not external scripts.

arcturus.why: Translates embodiment into protocol—conditions, pacing, access rules.

draco.why: Guards boundaries so predatory pressure doesn’t force placement.

lyra.why: Becomes an example of relaxed, resonant physical presence.

orion-dark.why: Purity codes risk turning embodiment into orthodoxy.

pleiades.why: Humane pacing and care keep the body in trustful flow.

sirius.why: Embodiment protocol teaching—law of place and timing by example.

andromeda.why: Resists propaganda that the ‘good body’ must endure anything.

arcturus.why: Projected as universal exemplar → burnout/scapegoat when refusing bad contexts.

draco.why: Status games around who can push through the most.

lyra.why: Iconic, untheatrical poise—embodiment inspires without vanity.

orion-dark.why: Doctrine of ‘right place’ used to legitimize coercion.

orion-light.why: Integrity under projection—honor the true place, decline the wrong stage.

pleiades.why: Appeasing the room by staying where the body says ‘no.’

sirius.why: Instruction-by-presence: ethical embodiment under pressure and myth.

andromeda.why: Liberates communities from ‘place capture’—choose life-giving contexts.

arcturus.why: Elder standards—review of conditions, renewal/sunset of placements.

draco.why: Guards thresholds so placement serves life, not predation.

lyra.why: Quiet majesty—culture tunes to embodied dignity.

orion-dark.why: Canonizing ‘right place’ into hierarchy rather than living intelligence.

orion-light.why: Warrior elder—moves (or refuses) with impeccable bodily timing.

pleiades.why: Altitude here is standards/placement law, not bonding/soothing.

sirius.why: Embodiment sage—teaches the law of place and timing by embodied example.
